purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of work requests and their classifications.

inscope.li: the specification of the definitions needed to assign management resource information to a work request or a class of work requests;
the specification of the definitions needed to classify work requests;
the classification of a work request.

outscope.li: definitions of classes of work requests.

uof.name: Work_Request_Characterized
uof.description: The Work_Request_Characterized UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of characterized work request data.

aa.refpath: applied_attribute_classification_assignment {applied_attribute_classification_assignment <= attribute_classification_assignment attribute_classification_assignment.attribute_name = 'name'} applied_attribute_classification_assignment.items[i] = attribute_classification_item attribute_classification_item *> ap239_mri_attribute_classification_item ap239_mri_attribute_classification_item *> wreqchar_ap239_mri_attribute_classification_item wreqchar_ap239_mri_attribute_classification_item = versioned_action_request

applied_attribute_classification_assignment {applied_attribute_classification_assignment <= attribute_classification_assignment attribute_classification_assignment.attribute_name = 'status'} applied_attribute_classification_assignment.items[i] = attribute_classification_item attribute_classification_item *> ap239_mri_attribute_classification_item ap239_mri_attribute_classification_item *> wreqchar_ap239_mri_attribute_classification_item wreqchar_ap239_mri_attribute_classification_item = action_request_status

applied_classification_assignment.items[i] -> classification_item classification_item *> ap239_mri_classification_item ap239_mri_classification_item *> wreqchar_ap239_mri_classification_item wreqchar_ap239_mri_classification_item = versioned_action_request

applied_classification_assignment.items[i] -> classification_item classification_item *> ap239_mri_classification_item ap239_mri_classification_item *> wreqchar_ap239_mri_classification_item wreqchar_ap239_mri_classification_item = applied_action_request_assignment

alt_map.description: if the assigned_date is a Calendar_date
alt_map.refpath: (date_assignment=> applied_date_assignment applied_date_assignment.items[i] -> date_item date_item *> mri_date_item mri_date_item *> wreqchar_mri_date_item wreqchar_mri_date_item = action_request_solution)

alt_map.description: if the assigned_date is a Date_time
alt_map.refpath: (date_and_time_assignment=> applied_date_and_time_assignment applied_date_and_time_assignment.items[i] -> date_and_time_item *> mri_date_and_time_item mri_date_and_time_item *> wreqchar_mri_date_and_time_item wreqchar_mri_date_and_time_item = action_request_solution)

alt_map.description: if the assigned_date is a Calendar_date
alt_map.refpath: (date_assignment=> applied_date_assignment applied_date_assignment.items[i] -> date_item date_item *> mri_date_item mri_date_item *> wreqchar_mri_date_item wreqchar_mri_date_item = versioned_action_request)

alt_map.description: if the assigned_date is a Date_time
alt_map.refpath: (date_and_time_assignment=> applied_date_and_time_assignment applied_date_and_time_assignment.items[i] -> date_and_time_item *> mri_date_and_time_item mri_date_and_time_item *> wreqchar_mri_date_and_time_item wreqchar_mri_date_and_time_item = versioned_action_request)

aa.refpath: applied_identification_assignment.items[i] -> identification_item identification_item *> mri_identification_item mri_identification_item *> wreqchar_mri_identification_item wreqchar_mri_identification_item = versioned_action_request

alt_map.refpath: (applied_organization_assignment.items[i] -> organization_item organization_item *> mri_organization_item mri_organization_item *> wreqchar_mri_organization_item wreqchar_mri_organization_item = versioned_action_request)

(applied_person_and_organization_assignment.items[i] -> person_and_organization_item person_and_organization_item *> mri_person_and_organization_item mri_person_and_organization_item *> wreqchar_mri_person_and_organization_item wreqchar_mri_person_and_organization_item = versioned_action_request)

(applied_organization_assignment.items[i] -> organization_item organization_item *> mri_organization_item mri_organization_item *> wreqchar_mri_organization_item wreqchar_mri_organization_item = action_request_solution)
